title: Getting Started with React Router
content: An introduction to React Router: how to install it, set up basic routes, and navigate between pages in a single-page application. Includes simple examples and best practices for beginners.

title: Nested Routes and Layouts
content: Explains nested routing patterns, route layouts, and how to compose complex UIs using parent and child routes. Covers outlet usage and layout components for consistent page structure.

title: Route Parameters and Data Loading
content: Covers dynamic route parameters, reading params inside components, and strategies for fetching data per route. Shows examples with useParams, useLoader, and handling loading/error states.

title: Protected Routes and Authentication
content: Describes how to protect routes behind authentication, create private route wrappers, and redirect unauthorized users. Includes patterns for storing auth state and persisting sessions.

title: Performance Tips for Routing
content: Practical tips to improve routing performance: code-splitting route components, prefetching data, optimizing route matching, and minimizing re-renders when switching routes.
